title: data attributes
description: 'node' contains the internal description of the nodes by the vis.js library as well as some properties that help remember and propagate the meaning of the node in TAPIS

label.description: The label that acompanies the node shape

image.description: Path to the image shown inside the shape

STAURL.description: URL of the service or file represented as a table. Includes de path and query parameters

STAEntityName.description: Last name of the entity in the path or expanded. Defines the scope of the node query parameters

STASelectExpandNextOrigin.description: Points to the the recursive STASelectedExpands expanded entity that is the focus of the node query parameters. If empty, points to the root of STASelectedExpands

skip.description: Number of entities to skip in the response. Default is 0

top.description: Number of entities to include in the response. Default is 100

orderBy.description: Criteria to sort the entities in the response

attribute.description: Name of the attribute that is used to sort the data

desc.description: Way to sort the data. true mean descending. false mean ascending

selected.description: Attributes selected to be included in the returned entities. If missing, all attributes are included. The implementation also supports an object with additionalProperties that are booleans for historical reasons.

additionalProperties.description: Name of the entity to be expanded as a JSON object in the response

STAFilter.description: Schema and data to built filter query

entity.description: Entity where the filter will be applied

filterSchema.description: Scheme to be able to set filter priorities

filterData.description: The information to form the filter, such as entities, properties, conditions and values
